snippet.title: Ze VR Trailer
snippet.description:
A new VR game on the Steam store, Ze VR is a fast paced, exciting take on the classic and proven breakout concept. Shoot the balls at the targets, then deflect them using your shield or airborne pulses. Teleport to another position to better aim your initial burst. If you hit a shooting bonus just blast those blocks directly!
Fast reflexes, precise aiming and strategic thinking will get you to the top of the leaderboard..

Release date: March 28th

Steam store link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/574220/
